name: invoisaic
description: AI-Powered Invoice Automation Platform using AWS Bedrock AgentCore

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../infrastructure && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd infrastructure && cdk deploy --all
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cd infrastructure && cdk deploy --all --context environment=dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cd infrastructure && cdk deploy --all --context environment=prod --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://invoisaic-frontend-prod --delete
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:infrastructure
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build && npm run bootstrap
scripts.quickstart: npm run setup && npm run deploy
